016package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.controller;
017
018import android.content.Intent;
019import android.os.Bundle;
020import android.view.Menu;
021import android.view.MenuItem;
022import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
023import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
024import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
025import androidx.navigation.NavController;
026import androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment;
027import androidx.navigation.ui.AppBarConfiguration;
028import androidx.navigation.ui.NavigationUI;
029import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
030import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.NavigationGraphDirections;
032import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.R;
033import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.databinding.ActivityMainBinding;
034import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
035import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.viewmodel.PermissionsViewModel;
036import java.util.HashSet;
037import java.util.Set;
038
039/**
040 * Serves as a basic container activity&mdash;that is, it presents no UI elements of its own (apart
041 * from an options menu), but hosts a {@link androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment} for
042 * presentation of one or more {@link androidx.fragment.app.Fragment} instances, associated with a
043 * navigation graph.
044 * <p>In addition to the navigation host role, this activity demonstrates the
045 * handling of:</p>
046 * <ul><li><p>user sign-out (initiated by selection of an options menu item), with automatic
047 * navigation back to {@link LoginActivity} on completion of the sign-out;</p></li>
048 * <li><p>user-initiated navigation to {@link SettingsActivity};</p></li>
049 * <li><p>updates of UI {@link android.view.View} widget properties based on preference values
050 * (obtained from {@link edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.viewmodel.PreferencesViewModel});</p></li>
051 * <li><p>key events in the permissions request flow.</p></li></ul>
052 */
053@AndroidEntryPoint
054public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity implements
055    PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener {
056
057  private static final int PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE = 128158634;
058
059  private ActivityMainBinding binding;
060  private LoginViewModel loginViewModel;
061  private PermissionsViewModel permissionsViewModel;
062
063  @Override
064  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
065    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
066    setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
067    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
068    NavController navController = ((NavHostFragment)getSupportFragmentManager()
069        .findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment))
070        .getNavController();
071    AppBarConfiguration appBarConfig = new AppBarConfiguration.Builder(R.id.navigate_controls)
072        .build();
073    NavigationUI
074        .setupActionBarWithNavController(this, navController, appBarConfig);
075    setupViewModels();
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) {
080    super.onCreateOptionsMenu(menu);
081    getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.main_options, menu);
082    return true;
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem item) {
087    boolean handled = true;
088    int itemId = item.getItemId();
089    if (itemId == R.id.settings) {
090      Intent intent = new Intent(this, SettingsActivity.class);
091      startActivity(intent);
092    } else if (itemId == R.id.sign_out) {
093      loginViewModel.signOut();
094    } else {
095      handled = super.onOptionsItemSelected(item);
096    }
097    return handled;
098  }
099
100  @Override
101  public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode, @NonNull String[] permissions,
102      @NonNull int[] grantResults) {
103    if (requestCode == PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE) {
104      permissionsViewModel.handlePermissionsRequestResult(permissions, grantResults);
105    } else {
106      super.onRequestPermissionsResult(requestCode, permissions, grantResults);
107    }
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  public void onAcknowledge(String[] permissions) {
112    requestPermissions(permissions, PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE);
113  }
114
115  private void setupViewModels() {
116    loginViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(LoginViewModel.class);
117    loginViewModel
118        .getAccount()
119        .observe(this, this::handleAccount);
120    permissionsViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(PermissionsViewModel.class);
121    Set<String> permissionsToRequest = new HashSet<>();
122    Set<String> permissionsToExplain = new HashSet<>();
123    permissionsViewModel.checkPermissions(this, permissionsToRequest, permissionsToExplain);
124    if (!permissionsToExplain.isEmpty()) {
125      //noinspection DataFlowIssue
126      ((NavHostFragment) getSupportFragmentManager()
127          .findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment))
128          .getNavController()
129          .navigate(NavigationGraphDirections.explainPermissions(
130              permissionsToExplain.toArray(new String[0]),
131              permissionsToRequest.toArray(new String[0])));
132    } else if (!permissionsToRequest.isEmpty()) {
133      requestPermissions(permissionsToRequest.toArray(new String[0]), PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE);
134    }
135  }
136
137  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account) {
138    if (account == null) {
139      Intent intent = new Intent(this, LoginActivity.class)
140          .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
141      startActivity(intent);
142    }
143  }
144
145  @Override
146  public boolean onSupportNavigateUp() {
147    getOnBackPressedDispatcher().onBackPressed();
148    return true;
149  }
150
151}
